dcterms:creator: Y. Mirsky
T. Doitshman
Y. Elovici
A. Shabtai
dcterms:description: The Kitsune dataset contains network traffic recordings of various attacks along with benign and malicious labels for the network traffic packets. It is used to evaluate the performance of intrusion detection systems.
dcterms:title: Kitsune Dataset

dcterms:creator: I. Sharafaldin
A. H. Lashkari
A. A. Ghorbani
dcterms:description: CIC IDS 2017 is a dataset designed for intrusion detection, containing labeled network traffic data for various types of attacks and benign traffic. It is utilized for training and evaluating intrusion detection systems.
dcterms:title: CIC IDS 2017
